about_the_game:
GSC Game World presents Days of Brilliance, the first DLC for Cossacks 3, that adds even more depth and content to the battlefields of 17-18th century Europe. Enhance your overall experience with the new historical campaign, various missions, units and more!

Main features:

  • Polish campaign: Experience the most thrilling events of the Polish history in 17th century. From the genius Battle of Klushino to the grand Saving of Vienna, lead the mighty winged hussars over the plains of Europe in the age of their greatest triumphs and victories.
  • New exclusive missions: 5 new exciting missions will take you all over the Europe and allow you to assume the role of general in the key historical military events of the 17th and 18th century Old World.
  • Additional nations: Play as mighty Denmark or the swift Netherlands, each with its own new unique buildings, units and music themes.
  • Brand-new original units: 5 new units will set their foot on the battlefields of 17th century Europe, including original new units, exclusive to Cossacks 3, for new nations and Poland.
detailed_description:
GSC Game World presents Days of Brilliance, the first DLC for Cossacks 3, that adds even more depth and content to the battlefields of 17-18th century Europe. Enhance your overall experience with the new historical campaign, various missions, units and more!

Main features:

  • Polish campaign: Experience the most thrilling events of the Polish history in 17th century. From the genius Battle of Klushino to the grand Saving of Vienna, lead the mighty winged hussars over the plains of Europe in the age of their greatest triumphs and victories.
  • New exclusive missions: 5 new exciting missions will take you all over the Europe and allow you to assume the role of general in the key historical military events of the 17th and 18th century Old World.
  • Additional nations: Play as mighty Denmark or the swift Netherlands, each with its own new unique buildings, units and music themes.
  • Brand-new original units: 5 new units will set their foot on the battlefields of 17th century Europe, including original new units, exclusive to Cossacks 3, for new nations and Poland.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu, Mint
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, 512 MB GPU RAM (Intel video-cards are not officially supported and game may not work)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimal Screen Resolution - 1280x768

name: Deluxe Content - Cossacks 3: Days of Brilliance

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.0GHz / Core i3 1.6GHz / AMD Athlon II X2 280
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 9600 GT / Radeon HD 4830 / Intel HD5000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen Resolution - 1280x768
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20GHz or AMD FX-6300, 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 560 / ATI Radeon HD 7900 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen Resolution - 1920x1080

short_description: Days of Brilliance is the first DLC for Cossacks 3, that adds even more depth and content to the battlefields of 17-18th century Europe. Enhance your overall experience with the new historical campaign, various missions, original units, atmospheric soundtrack and more!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Czech, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish
